page.title: 13A Flood in Aberlour.
page.content: About two years ago, there was a flood in Aberlour. It rained so heavily that the drains couldn't cope and the streets were filled with water. Gardens were washed away, plants were lost and there was mud everywhere. Thousands of pounds worth of damage was done to farms as seed which had just been planted and fertiliser was washed away. Later it sprouted about half a mile away beside the old railway line. The water running down the fields cut fizzures in the ground so we could see the different layers of soil and gravel right down to the boulders.
